english.segment1: the fading sun, the rising moon. are fighting for the afternoon. the day gives in, gives up its light. the stars wake up, to keep the night
english.segment2: and as you glory fill the sky, I wonder. how could you. consider me. so much more. than all i see. cause i am not. have never been. beautiful like this
english.segment3: my weary words, and broken lies. are set beneath, your summer skies. what's worn and wrong, what's good and right. I laid before, my eyes tonight
english.segment4: but you make all things new. Jesus, you make all things new. I'm beautiful in you, oh, oh, oh
english.segment5: that's how you could. consider me. so much more. than all i see. redemption mends. a brokenness. it heals our wounds. removes our sins. your purest love. was humbly spent. to bow our hearts. and draw me in. where i become. whole again. I'm beautiful like this. I'm beautiful like this
english.segment6: what can wash away my sin. nothing but your blood oh Jesus. Thank you, Thank you Jesus
